ing: 1/2 fluid ounce white creme de cacao
des: "This delicious cocktail tastes just like an Italian wedding cake cookie!"
ins: Pour the vodka, cranberry juice, pineapple juice, amaretto, and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass to serve.
